testcase.brief: Accounting start while client passes authentication
testcase.description: -Create an account on RADIUS server, including username, password and expiration time -enable radius accounting on the ssid

step.desc: 1: Configure authentication type CWP (passthrough/e-cwp) on ap
step.telnet: -v "security-object auto-cwp" -v "security-object auto-cwp security aaa radius-server primary ${pub.radius2.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object auto-cwp security aaa radius-server accounting primary ${pub.radius2.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object auto-cwp security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal auth-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object auto-cwp web-server" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object auto-cwp" -v "interface ${ssid_bind_interface} ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile 1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1" -v "_debug auth all"

step.desc: open debug mode and clear log all
client request a web page and get login page,input correct username and password
step.script: export PYTHONPATH=${auto.root.dir}; python ${auto.root.dir}/AerohiveGUI/scripts/cwp/cwp_login.py -r http://${sta1.mif.ip}:4444/wd/hub --parameters login.mode=normal visit.url=${url} login.username=${pub.radius1.username} login.password=${pub.radius1.passwd} -t ff -l info -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.log-match: -b "RADIUS message: code=4 \(Accounting\-Request\)" -ps p "Sending RADIUS message to accounting server ${pub.radius2.ip}" p "Got vlan ID 1 by User Profile ID 1 for station ${sta1.tif.mac}" -e "starting accounting session" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: clear auth station,but not clear auth roaming cache
show logging buffered,check accounting stop packet.
step.log-match: -b "stopped accounting session" -ps p "Sending RADIUS message to accounting server ${pub.radius2.ip}" p "RADIUS message: code=4 \(Accounting-Request\)" -e "deauthenticated due to local deauth request" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: client reconnect in step 13,check accounting start packet.
step.log-match: -b "RADIUS message: code=4 \(Accounting\-Request\)" -ps p "Sending RADIUS message to accounting server ${pub.radius2.ip}" -e "starting accounting session" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
